ARABIC: يَوْمَ تُبَدَّلُ ٱلْأَرْضُ غَيْرَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَبَرَزُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلْوَٰحِدِ ٱلْقَهَّارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day the earth is changed to other than the earth, and the heavens likewise, and they parade before Allah, the One, the All-Conquering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day when the earth will he replaced by some other than the earth, as will be the skies, and every one will appear before God the one and omnipotent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Do warn them of the) Day when the heavens and the earth shall be altogether changed; when all will appear fully exposed before Allah, the One, the Irresistible!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when the earth and the heavens will be replaced by another earth and heavens and everyone will be brought before the One Almighty God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On the day when the earth will be changed to other than this earth, and the heavens – and they will all come forth standing before Allah, the One, the Dominant above all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: On the Day when the earth will be changed to another earth and so will be the heavens, and they (all creatures) will appear before Allah, the One, the Irresistible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: On the day when the earth shall be changed into a different earth, and the heavens (as well), and they shall come forth before Allah, the One, the Supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day the earth shall be changed to other than the earth, and the heavens and they sally forth unto God, the One, the Omnipotent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On the day when the earth will be changed to other than the earth, and the heavens (also will be changed) and they will come forth unto Allah, the One, the Almighty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On the Day when the earth shall be changed into another earth, as shall be the heavens, they will all appear before God, the One, the Most Supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On the Day whereon the earth will be changed into other than the earth, and the heavens also; and all creatures will appear unto Allah, the One, the Subduer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The day when the earth is turned into another earth and the heavens [as well], and they are presented before Allah, the One, the All-paramount
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: One day the earth will be changed to a different earth, and so will be the heavens, and (men) will be marshalled forth, before Allah, the One, the Irresistible;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: On the Day when the earth will be changed to another earth and so will be the heavens, and they (all creatures) will appear before Allah, the One, the Irresistible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On the Day when the earth is changed into other than the earth and the heavens, all shall come before Allah, the One, the Conqueror.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when the earth is changed into another earth, and the heavens, and they will emerge before God, the One, the Irresistible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It will be] on the Day the earth will be replaced by another earth, and the heavens [as well], and all creatures will come out before Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:48] And mention, the day when the earth will be changed to other than the earth and the heavens, namely, the Day of Resurrection: mankind shall be gathered onto a white clear earth, as [reported] in the hadīth of the two Shaykhs [al-Bukhārī and Muslim]. Muslim relates the following hadīth: ‘The Prophet (s) was asked, “Where will people be on that day?” He said, “On the Bridge (sirāt)” ’; and they shall come forth, they shall exit from [their] graves, to God, the One, the Almighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On the day when the earth will be changed to other than the earth) it will be changed to a state other than the actual state. Its changing will take place by adding to and subtracting from it, and its valleys and mountains will be levelled down; and it is also said that this means: the earth will be changed to other than what it is now, (and the heavens (also will be changed)) they will be folded up in His right Hand (and they will come forth unto Allah) they emerge and become manifest to (the One, the Almighty) Who conquers His created being by means of death.
